#summary Files
#labels Branch-Type-Class
#sidebar BranchTypesMachineAutomationSidebar

= Introduction =

Information about the files on the machine.

= Properties =

|| separator || string || The string used to separate path elements. ||


= Callables =

|| number_of_directories || int ( string ) || Number of directories in the given path to a directory. ||
|| number_of_files || int ( string ) || Number of files in the given path to a directory. ||
|| directory_name || string ( string int ) || Get the name of directory number "index" in the given path to a directory. ||
|| file_name || string ( string int ) || Get the name of file number "index" in the given path to a directory. ||
|| size || int ( string ) || Get the size  ( in bytes ) of the given file. ||
|| read || byte-array ( string ) || Get the entire contents of the given file. ||
|| write || void ( string byte-array ) || Write the given data as the file "path". ||
|| create_directory || void ( string ) || Create the given directory. ||
|| remove_directory || void ( string ) || Remove the given directory path. ||
|| remove_file || void ( string ) || Remove the give file. ||
